item.title: Getting Started with Scala
item.author: Author
item.description: Overview Why need to learn Scala Spark and Flink are memory-level big data computing framework are very important part of big data. Spark and Flink are written in Scala. Therefore, in order to learn Spark and Flink better, you need to master the language Scala. The rise of Spark drives the development of the Scala language! Scala history Martin Odersky of the Federal Institute of Technology began designing Scala in 2001.
